body:
Hello,


just received my new Canon EOS 450D and tried to capture HDR´s via CanonHDRcap.


In the CanonHDRcap.out window I get the following error message:
Canon SDK version 8.2.0 opendend
No Camera found!
Camera Error: ID = 0x0c000080


I have connected the camera via the usb-cable. When I start the camera the EOS Utility Programm starts and sees the camera, so I think there is a connection.


The README.txt says : ... Be shure to set it in the "PC cponnect" mode ... I am sorry, but I have no idea how to handle that.


Thank you very much for any ideas
Martin
___
